name: 18 Wheeler Truck Driver Simulator 3D – Drive out the semi trailers to transport cargo at their destination
name_original: 18 Wheeler Truck Driver Simulator 3D – Drive out the semi trailers to transport cargo at their destination
description:
Get on the road to have a real time 18 wheeler truck driving experience. It’s a great opportunity if you ever wanted to drive mega trucks. This simulation game is allowing you to play in 15 extreme levels with tough tasks to complete. Majorly your task is to deliver the loaded goods by passing through the city to different checkpoints in limited time. To make the game further interesting you need to pass through the city jam pack roads which will test your extreme driver skills.

You must be quick and attentive to drive and perceive the road in order to complete your task in time. This ultimate trucker driving simulation game will give an addictive long driving experience to get wonderful time. All you need is to avoid the road crash. In this simulator game you will have an amazing 3D experience of driving 18 wheeler trucks in two modes.

Features

-          Multiple 18 wheeler trucks to select from.
-          Career mode with challenging levels to complete in specific time limits.
-          15 levels of extreme road journeys.
-          Two different camera views to get best position in this simulator game.
-          Realistic 3D environment to drive in.
-          Awesome and user-friendly interface.
